title: Thermostat Controlled Variables for Operator Interface

rows.Name: Operator Feedback
rows.Physical Interpretation: Information provided back to the operator

rows.Name: Regulator Status
rows.Physical Interpretation: Status of the Thermostat Regulator Function

rows.Name: Alarm
rows.Physical Interpretation: Command to turn Alarm on or off
